metadata.title: President summons joint session of Parliament on Friday

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 23 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari on Thursday summoned the joint session of the Parliament on Friday, January 24, 2025, at 1:00 am. The President summoned the joint session to exercise the powers conferred by article 54(1) of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, according to a notification issued by the National Assembly Secretariat.
